text: I am the living bread which came down out of Heaven. If anyone eats of this bread he will live forever. Actually, the bread that I will give is my flesh,I take it that He is referring to His physical body, which represents the incarnation, with all that involved. which I will give on behalf of the life of the world.”“The life of the world”—wow! Well, according to Romans 8:19-23 the whole creation is groaning, waiting for redemption.
